frontmatter.title: The Beacon Chain
frontmatter.description: Learn about the Beacon Chain - the upgrade that introduced proof-of-stake Ethereum.
frontmatter.summaryPoint1: The Beacon Chain introduced proof-of-stake to the Ethereum ecosystem.
frontmatter.summaryPoint2: It was merged with the original Ethereum proof-of-work chain in September 2022.
frontmatter.summaryPoint3: The Beacon Chain introduced the consensus logic and block gossip protocol which now secures Ethereum.
